mapper.select: /* ShippingListMapper.shippingGetOrders */ SELECT ISNULL(COMPCD , '') AS "compcd" , ISNULL(ORGCD , '') AS "orgcd" , ISNULL(XRT_INVC_SNO , '') AS "xrtInvcSno" , ISNULL(INVC_SNO1 , '') AS "invcSno1" , ISNULL(LOCAL_SHIPPER , '') AS "slug" , ISNULL(STATUS_CD , '') AS "statusCd" , ISNULL(ADDUSERCD , '') AS "addusercd" FROM TORDER WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORGCD = 'M00494' AND STATUS_CD BETWEEN '50' AND '80' ORDER BY ADDUSERCD ASC
SELECT ORGCD AS orgCd FROM TORDER WHERE 1 = 1 AND XRT_INVC_SNO = #{xrtInvcSno}
SELECT T.ORD_NO AS ordNo, D.ORD_SEQ AS ordSeq FROM TORDER T LEFT JOIN TORDERDTL D ON T.ORD_CD = D.ORD_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND XRT_INVC_SNO = #{xrtInvcSno}
